thread.title: Instagram user Kayla documents 100LB weight loss
thread.title_full: Instagram user Kayla documents 100LB weight loss

title: Instagram user Kayla documents 100LB weight loss
text: Share this article Share Quite a difference: The blonde beauty revealed that she was once told that she was 'a waste of a pretty face' On her way: After years of struggling, Kayla finally had gastric sleeve surgery in 2015 Kayla has been documenting her journey for just over a year, since just a couple of weeks after she had her weight loss surgery. In no time she was already done 40 pounds and taking to the social media page to celebrate that 'my ribs and hip bones have finally come out of hiding.' Kayla's account shows her gaining the confidence to pose in a bikini, wear a crop top out with friends and even marks the touching moment her boyfriend was first able to pick her up. Taking the plunge: On her @Kayla_GotFit account, the student shares landmark weight loss moments with her followers Looking back: The next step in Kayla's journey will be surgery to remove loose skin Looking good! Kayla is just 10lbs away from her goal weight of 160lbs The inspirational posts are massively popular with other women who are considering the surgery, who take to the comments section to quiz Kayla on her incredible journey. As it stands now, the 5'8 student is just 10lbs away from her goal weight of 160lbs, and she is also making preparations to have her excess skin removed - one step closer to obtaining her dream body. 'The sleeve changed my health but it also boosted my confidence,' she added. I never listened to the haters but now they can suck it.' Read more: Share or comment on this article 49
